body: On my profile i wait for about 5-10 minutes for my stats to appear, and they don't, also I've waited 5 days for my skin to update on here and it still hasn't... O.o

title: Statistics and Skin not loading

replies.body: Newer players can't see their stats for some reason. You can see your kills, deaths, and levels on the leaderboard if you search your name, though.
